overview: A young and attractive writer (Brigitta Bulgari) is struggling with a creative crisis. At the suggestion of her publisher will not grant an extension to leave home with her husband to go to Budapest.  She comes in the beautiful capital with the firm intention of finding herself, find a place where she can relax and leave the physical and mental behind. She quickly finds what she's been searching for, "Amenes", the house of pleasure.
title: Emotions
